column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Latin American Politics MSc provides students with an opportunity to develop their general and specialist knowledge of major issues in the politics of Latin America. The programme's graduates have established careers in research, journalism, teaching, and policy formulation and implementation in both government agencies and NGOs.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
